name: Soft Pretzels
ingredients: 1 1/2 c. warm water 4 cups flour, sifted
steps: Toppings: 1 egg, butter, or cinnamon and sugar
Dissolve yeast in water. Add salt and sugar. Blend flour and knead dough on floured surface until smooth. Roll
into strips into ropes and twist into pretzel-­‐like shapes. Place on greased sheet, brush with egg and sprinkle with
salt. Bake ar 425 for15 minutes or until golden brown.
